Text.Page:
Mission Orders

The shurians and their allies threaten our control of Fyrmount.

Take out the {@LinkCreature:4#2021#shurian foe-hammers}, {@LinkCreature:4#2031#eldritch berserkers} and {@LinkCreature:4#2041#reavers}, as well as {@LinkCreature:4#2051#raging arbosks}.

Report to Keinie at Cauldron Outpost when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
